titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: UK BANK ACCOUNT NUMBER (Retired) - Description

p.b: UK BANK ACCOUNT NUMBER has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

div.p: The last live version of UK BANK ACCOUNT NUMBER is available in the January 2014 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

p.b: Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
